product_name: Pearl Izumi Fly In-R-Cool Sport Bike Tank Top - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The women's Fly In-R-Cool Sport Bike Tank Top provides athletic support in a streamlined fit with innovative In-R-Cool fabric technology that cools the body while you exercise.
